name: Donald Ervin Knuth
doctoral_students: Leonidas J. Guibas Scott Kim, Vaughan Pratt Robert Sedgewick (computer scientist)
known_for: ''The Art of Computer Programming'' TeX, METAFONT Knuth–Morris–Pratt algorithm Knuth–Bendix completion algorithm MMIX
